## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-867">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-867">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-868">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-869">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-869">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-870">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-871">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-871">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-872">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-872">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-873">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-873">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-874">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-875">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-875">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-877">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-878">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-878">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-879">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-879">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-880">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-881">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-882">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-882">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-884">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-884">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-889">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-889">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-890">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-890">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="06242-892">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-892">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-912">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-912">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-913">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-913">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-914">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-915">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-915">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-917">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-917">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-918">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-918">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-919">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-919">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-920">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-920">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-921">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-921">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-922">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-922">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-923">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-924">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-924">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-925">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-926">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-926">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-927">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-927">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-928">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-928">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-929">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-988">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-988">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-989">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-989">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-990">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-990">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-991">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-991">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-992">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-992">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-993">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-993">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-994">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-995">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-995">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-997">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-997">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-998">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-998">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-999">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-999">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1000">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1000">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1001">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1001">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1002">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1002">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1003">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1003">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1004">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1004">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1005">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1005">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1006">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1006">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1007">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1007">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1008">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1008">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1009">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1009">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1010">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1010">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1011">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1012">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1012">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1013">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1014">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1014">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1015">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1016">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1016">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1017">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1018">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1019">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1020">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1020">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1021">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1021">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1022">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1022">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1042">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1042">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1043">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1044">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1045">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1045">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1047">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1047">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1048">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1048">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1049">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1049">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1050">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1050">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1051">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1051">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1052">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1052">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1053">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1054">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1054">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1055">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1056">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1057">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1057">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1058">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1058">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1117">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1117">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1118">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1119">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1119">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1121">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1121">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1122">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1122">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1123">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1123">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1124">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1124">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1125">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1125">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1126">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1126">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1127">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1128">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1128">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1129">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1129">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1130">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1130">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1132">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1132">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1134">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1135">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1135">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1136">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1136">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1137">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1138">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1139">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1139">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1140">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1140">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1152">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1152">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1153">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1153">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1154">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1154">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1155">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1155">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1156">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1156">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1157">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1157">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1158">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1158">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1159">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1159">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1160">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1160">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1161">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1161">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1162">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1162">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1163">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1163">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1164">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1164">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1165">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1165">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1166">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1166">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1167">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1167">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1168">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1168">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1169">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1169">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1170">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1170">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1171">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1171">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1172">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1173">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1173">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1174">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1174">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1175">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1175">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1197">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1197">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1198">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1199">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1199">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1200">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1200">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1201">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1202">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1202">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1203">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1203">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1204">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1204">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1205">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1205">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1206">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1206">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1207">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1207">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1208">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1208">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1209">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1209">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1210">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1210">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1211">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1211">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1212">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1212">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1213">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1213">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1218">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1218">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1219">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1219">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1222">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1222">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1223">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1225">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1225">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1230">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1230">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1233">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1233">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1234">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1234">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1235">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1236">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1237">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1237">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1239">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1239">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1240">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1240">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1241">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1241">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1242">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1242">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1243">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1243">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1244">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1244">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1245">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1245">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1247">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1247">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1257">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1257">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1258">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1258">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1262">сумпс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1262">сумпс</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1263">шофьорска книжка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1263">шофьорска книжка</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1264">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1264">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1265">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1265">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1266">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1266">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1267">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1267">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1268">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1268">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1269">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1269">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1270">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1270">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1271">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1271">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1272">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1272">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1273">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1273">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1274">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1275">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1278">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1279">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1279">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1280">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1281">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1281">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1326">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1326">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1327">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1327">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1328">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1329">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1329">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1330">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="06242-1331">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1331">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1332">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1333">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1333">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1335">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1336">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1337">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1338">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1338">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1339">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1339">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1340">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1340">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1341">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1341">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1342">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1342">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1343">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1343">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1344">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1344">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1345">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1345">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1346">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1347">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1347">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1348">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1349">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1349">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1350">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1350">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1351">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1351">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1352">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1352">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1353">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1353">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1354">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1355">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1355">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1357">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1357">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1402">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1402">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1403">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1404">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1404">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1405">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1406">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1406">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1407">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1407">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1408">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1408">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1409">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1409">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1410">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1410">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1411">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1411">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1412">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1412">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1413">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1414">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1414">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1416">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1416">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1417">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1417">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1418">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1418">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1419">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1419">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1421">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1421">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1422">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1422">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1446">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1446">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1447">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1448">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1448">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1450">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1450">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1452">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1452">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1455">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1455">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1456">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1456">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1457">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1457">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

      </Pattern>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1598">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1599">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1599">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1600">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1601">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1602">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1602">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1603">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1603">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1615">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1615">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1616">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1617">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1617">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1618">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1619">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1619">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1621">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1624">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1624">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1625">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1625">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1655">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1655">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1656">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1657">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1657">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1658">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1659">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1659">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1660">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1661">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1661">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1662">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1663">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1663">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-1664">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1664">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1697">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1697">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1698">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1698">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1699">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1699">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1700">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1700">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1701">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1701">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1702">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1702">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1703">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1703">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1704">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1704">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1705">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1705">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1706">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1706">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1707">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1707">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1708">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1709">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1711">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1712">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1712">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1713">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1713">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-1714">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1714">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-1715">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1715">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-1716">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1716">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1718">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1719">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1719">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1720">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1720">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1721">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1721">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1746">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1746">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1747">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1748">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1748">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1749">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1750">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1750">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1751">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1751">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1752">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1752">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1753">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1753">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1754">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1754">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1755">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1755">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1756">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1756">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1757">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1757">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1762">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1762">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1763">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1763">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1764">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1766">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1766">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1767">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1767">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1782">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1782">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1783">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1784">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1784">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1785">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1786">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1786">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1787">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1787">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1788">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1788">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1789">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1789">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1790">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1790">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1791">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1791">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1792">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1792">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1793">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1793">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1794">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1795">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1795">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1796">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1796">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1797">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1798">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1798">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1799">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1799">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1800">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1800">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
