## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1813">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1813">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1814">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1815">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1815">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1817">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1817">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1818">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1819">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1819">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-1820">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1821">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1821">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1822">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1822">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1823">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1823">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-1824">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1824">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-1825">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1825">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-1826">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1826">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1827">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1827">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-1828">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1828">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1829">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1829">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-1830">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-1830">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2036">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2036">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2037">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2037">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2038">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2038">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2039">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2039">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2040">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2040">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2041">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2041">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2042">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2043">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2043">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2044">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2045">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2046">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2046">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2047">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2047">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2048">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2048">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2049">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2049">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2053">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2053">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2054">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2054">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2063">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2063">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2064">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2064">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2065">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2066">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2066">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2067">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2068">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2068">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2069">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2070">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2070">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2071">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2072">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2072">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2073">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2073">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2074">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2074">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2105">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2105">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2106">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2106">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2107">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2108">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2108">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2109">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="06242-2110">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2110">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2111">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2112">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2114">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2114">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2115">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2115">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2116">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2116">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2117">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2117">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2118">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2118">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2119">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2119">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2120">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2120">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2121">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2121">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2122">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2122">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2123">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2123">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2124">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2125">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2125">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2126">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2127">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2127">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2128">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2128">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2129">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2129">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2131">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2134">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2134">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2135">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2135">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2138">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2138">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2140">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2140">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2141">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2141">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2142">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2142">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2143">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2143">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2144">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2144">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2145">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2145">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2146">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2148">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2148">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2149">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="06242-2150">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2150">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2151">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2151">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2152">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2152">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2153">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2154">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2154">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2156">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2157">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2157">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2158">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2158">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2160">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2160">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2161">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2161">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2162">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2162">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2163">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2163">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2164">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2164">master citizen number</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2177">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2177">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2178">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2178">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2179">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2180">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2180">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2182">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2182">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2183">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2183">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2184">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2184">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2186">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2186">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2189">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2189">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2190">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2190">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2191">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2191">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2192">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2192">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2223">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2223">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2224">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2224">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2225">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2225">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2226">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2226">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2227">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2227">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2228">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2228">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2229">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2230">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2230">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2231">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2232">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2232">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2233">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2233">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2234">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2234">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2236">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2236">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2245">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2245">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2249">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2249">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2250">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2251">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2252">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2252">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2253">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2253">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="06242-2254">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2254">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2255">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2255">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2256">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2256">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2257">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2257">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2258">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2258">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2259">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2259">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2260">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2260">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2261">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2261">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2262">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2262">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2263">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2263">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2264">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2264">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2265">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2265">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2266">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2266">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2267">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2267">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2268">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2268">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2269">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2269">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2270">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2270">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2271">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2272">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2272">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2274">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2274">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2275">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2276">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2276">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2279">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2279">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2280">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2280">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2281">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2281">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2282">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2282">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2283">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2283">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2284">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2284">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2285">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2285">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2286">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2286">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2287">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2287">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2288">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2289">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2290">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2290">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2292">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2292">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-2293">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2293">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2294">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2294">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2295">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2295">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2297">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2297">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2300">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2300">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2301">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2301">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2302">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2303">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2303">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2332">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2332">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2333">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2333">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2334">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2335">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2335">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2336">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2337">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2337">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2338">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2338">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2339">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2339">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2340">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2340">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2341">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2342">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2342">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2345">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2345">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2346">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2346">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2347">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2347">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2348">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2348">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2351">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2351">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2352">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2352">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2353">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2353">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2354">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2354">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2355">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2355">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2357">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2358">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2358">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2359">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2359">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2360">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2360">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2361">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2361">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2362">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2362">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2363">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2363">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2364">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2364">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2365">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2366">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2366">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2367">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2368">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2368">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2369">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2370">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2370">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2372">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2373">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2373">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2374">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2374">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2375">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2375">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2376">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2376">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2377">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2377">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2378">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2378">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2379">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2379">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2380">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2380">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2381">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2381">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2382">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2382">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2383">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2383">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2384">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2385">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2385">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2387">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2387">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2388">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2388">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2389">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2389">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2390">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2390">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2391">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2391">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2392">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2392">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2393">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2393">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2394">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2394">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2395">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2395">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2396">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2396">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2397">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2397">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2398">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2398">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2399">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2400">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2400">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2401">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2402">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2403">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2403">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2404">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2404">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2405">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2405">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2406">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2406">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2407">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2407">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2408">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2408">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2409">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2409">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2410">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2411">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2411">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2413">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2413">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2414">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2414">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2415">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2415">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2416">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2416">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2417">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2417">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2418">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2419">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2419">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2420">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2421">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2422">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2422">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2423">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2423">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2424">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2425">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2425">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2426">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2426">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2427">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2427">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2428">돌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2428">birth number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2430">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2430">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2431">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2431">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2432">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2432">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2433">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2433">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2434">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2434">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2435">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2435">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2436">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2436">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2437">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2437">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2438">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2438">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2439">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2439">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2440">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2440">rodne cislo</span></span>

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2441">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2441">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2442">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2442">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2443">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2444">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2444">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2446">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2446">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2447">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2447">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2448">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2448">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2449">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2449">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2451">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2451">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2454">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2454">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2455">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2455">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2494">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2494">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2495">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2495">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2496">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2497">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2497">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2499">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2499">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2500">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2501">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2501">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2503">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2504">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2504">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2505">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2505">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2506">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2506">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2507">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2507">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2508">| dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2508">|dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2509">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2509">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2510">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2510">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2511">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2511">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2512">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2512">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2513">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2513">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2515">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2515">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2516">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2516">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2517">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2517">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2518">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2518">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2522">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2522">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2523">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2523">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2524">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2525">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2525">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2526">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2526">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="06242-2527">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2527">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2528">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2529">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2530">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2531">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2531">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2532">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2532">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2533">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2533">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2534">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2534">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2535">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2535">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2536">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2536">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2537">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2537">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2538">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2538">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2539">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2539">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2540">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2540">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2541">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2541">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2542">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2542">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2543">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2544">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2544">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2545">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2546">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2546">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2547">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2547">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2548">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2548">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2549">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2549">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2550">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2550">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2551">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2551">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2552">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2552">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2553">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2553">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2554">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2554">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2555">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2556">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_denmark_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2557">Keyword_denmark_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2557">Keyword_denmark_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2558">centrale personregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2558">centrale personregister</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2559">civilt registreringssystem</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2559">civilt registreringssystem</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2560">cpr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2560">cpr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2561">cpr #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2561">cpr#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2562">gesundheitskarte nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2562">gesundheitskarte nummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2607">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2607">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2608">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2608">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2609">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2610">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2610">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2612">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2612">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2613">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2613">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2614">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2614">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2615">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2615">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2616">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2617">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2617">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2619">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2620">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2620">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2621">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2621">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2622">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2623">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2623">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
