## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2637">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2637">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2638">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2638">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2639">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2640">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2640">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2642">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2642">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-2643">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2643">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2644">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2644">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2645">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2645">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2646">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2647">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2647">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2650">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2650">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2651">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2651">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2653">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2653">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2705">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2705">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2706">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2706">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2707">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2707">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2708">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2708">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2709">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2709">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2710">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2710">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2711">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2711">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2712">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2712">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2714">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2717">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2717">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2718">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2718">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2719">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2719">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2720">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2720">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2721">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2721">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2722">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2722">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2723">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2724">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2724">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2726">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2726">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-2727">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2727">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2728">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2728">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2729">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2730">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2730">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2732">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2733">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2733">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2734">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2734">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2735">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2735">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2736">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2736">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2737">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2737">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2738">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2738">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2739">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2739">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2740">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2740">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2741">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2741">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2742">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2742">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2743">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2743">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2744">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2744">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2745">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2745">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2746">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2746">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2747">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2747">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2748">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2748">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2749">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2749">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2750">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2750">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2751">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2751">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2752">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2753">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2753">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2754">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2755">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2755">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2756">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2756">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2757">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2757">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2758">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2758">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2759">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2759">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2760">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2761">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2762">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2763">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2763">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2764">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2764">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2765">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2765">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2767">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2767">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2800">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2800">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2801">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2801">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2802">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2803">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2803">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2805">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2805">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2806">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2807">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2807">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2809">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2810">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2810">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2811">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2811">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2812">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2812">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2813">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2813">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2814">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2814">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2815">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2815">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2816">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2816">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2817">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2817">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2818">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2818">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2819">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2819">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2820">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2821">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2821">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2822">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2823">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2823">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-2824">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2824">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2825">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2825">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2826">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2826">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2827">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2827">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2832">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2832">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2833">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2833">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-2834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2835">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2835">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2868">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2868">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2869">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2870">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2870">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2871">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2872">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2872">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-2875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-2876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2877">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2877">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2878">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2878">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-2879">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2879">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-2880">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2880">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-2881">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2881">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-2882">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2882">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-2883">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2883">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-2884">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-2884">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3330">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3330">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3331">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3331">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3332">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3333">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3333">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3334">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3335">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3335">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-3336">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3336">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3337">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3337">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-3338">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3338">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3339">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3340">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3340">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3341">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3343">정규식이 해당 `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3343">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3344">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3344">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3345">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3345">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3346">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3346">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3347">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3347">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3348">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3348">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3349">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3349">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3350">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3350">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3351">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3351">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3352">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3352">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3353">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3353">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3354">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3354">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3355">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3355">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3356">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3356">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3357">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3358">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3358">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3359">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3359">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3360">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3360">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3361">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3361">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3362">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3363">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3363">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3364">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3365">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3365">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3366">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3366">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3367">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3367">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3368">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3368">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3369">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3369">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3370">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3371">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3371">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3372">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3373">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3373">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3374">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3374">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3375">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3375">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3376">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3376">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3425">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3425">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3426">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3426">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3427">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3427">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3428">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3428">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3429">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3429">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3430">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3430">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3431">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3431">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3432">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3432">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3433">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3434">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3435">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3435">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3436">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3436">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3437">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3437">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3438">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3438">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3439">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3439">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3440">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3440">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3441">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3441">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3442">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3442">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3443">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3444">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3444">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3446">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3446">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-3447">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3447">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3448">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3448">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-3449">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3449">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-3450">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3450">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-3451">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3451">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3452">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3452">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3453">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3453">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3454">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3455">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3455">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3456">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3458">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3458">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3459">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3459">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3460">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3461">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3461">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3485">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3485">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3486">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3486">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3487">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3488">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3488">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3489">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3490">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3490">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3491">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3491">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3492">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3492">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3493">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3493">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3494">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3494">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3495">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3496">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3496">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3497">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3498">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3499">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3499">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3500">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3500">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3502">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3502">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3553">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3553">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3554">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3554">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3555">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3556">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3556">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3558">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3558">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3559">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3560">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3560">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3563">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3563">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3564">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3564">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3565">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3565">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3566">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3566">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3568">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3568">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3571">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3571">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3572">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3572">driving license</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3578">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3578">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3579">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3579">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3580">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3581">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3581">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3582">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3583">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3583">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3584">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3585">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3587">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3588">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3588">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3590">card number</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3601">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3601">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3602">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3602">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3603">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3604">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3604">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3606">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3606">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3607">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3607">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3608">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3608">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3609">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3609">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3610">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3611">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3611">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3612">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3613">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3614">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3614">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3615">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3615">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3636">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3636">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3637">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3637">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3638">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3638">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3639">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3639">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3640">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3640">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3641">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3641">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3642">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3642">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3643">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3643">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3644">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3644">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3645">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3648">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3649">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3649">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3650">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3650">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3651">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3651">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3652">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3653">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3653">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3654">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3654">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3655">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3681">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3681">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3682">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3682">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3684">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3684">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3686">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3686">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3687">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3687">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3688">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3688">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3689">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3689">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3690">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3690">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3691">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3691">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3692">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3692">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3693">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3694">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3694">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3695">From 키워드를 `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3695">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3697">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3697">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3717">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3717">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3718">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3718">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3719">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3720">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3720">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3721">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3722">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3722">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3723">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3723">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3724">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3724">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3725">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3725">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3726">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3726">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3727">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3727">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3728">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3728">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3729">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3729">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3730">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3730">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3731">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3731">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3732">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3732">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3733">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3733">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-3734">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3734">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-3735">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3735">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-3736">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3736">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3737">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3830">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3830">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3831">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3831">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3832">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3832">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3833">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3833">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3834">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3834">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3835">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3835">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3836">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3837">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3837">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3838">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3838">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3839">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3839">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3840">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3840">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3841">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3841">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3843">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3843">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3845">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3846">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3846">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3847">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3847">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3863">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3863">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-3864">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3864">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3865">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3866">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3866">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3867">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3868">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3868">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3869">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3869">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3870">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3870">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3871">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3871">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3872">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3872">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-3875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3877">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3877">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3878">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3878">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3879">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3879">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-3880">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3880">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3881">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3881">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3882">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3882">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-3883">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-3883">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
