## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6608">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6608">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6609">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6609">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6610">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6611">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6611">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6613">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6613">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6614">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6614">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6615">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6615">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6616">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6616">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6617">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6618">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6618">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6619">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6620">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6621">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6621">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6622">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6622">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6623">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6623">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6624">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6624">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6625">여권 번호 슬로베니아어 여권 번호 passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6625">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6626">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6626">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6627">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6627">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6628">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6628">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6629">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6629">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6630">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6630">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6631">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6631">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6632">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6632">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6633">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6633">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6634">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6634">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6635">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6635">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6636">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6636">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6637">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6637">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6638">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6639">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6639">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6663">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6663">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6664">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6665">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6665">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6667">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6667">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6668">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6668">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6669">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6669">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6670">1자리 시민권 표시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6670">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6671">숫자 "8" 또는 "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6671">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6672">체크섬 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6672">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6673">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6674">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6675">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6676">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6677">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6677">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6678">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6678">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6679">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6679">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6681">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6681">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6685">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6685">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6686">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6687">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6687">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6689">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6689">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6690">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6690">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6691">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6691">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6692">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6692">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6693">4자리 출생 지역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6693">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6694">앞 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분하기 위해 사용되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6694">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6695">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6695">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6700">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6700">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6701">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6701">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6703">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6704">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6704">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6705">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6706">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6706">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6707">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6707">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6708">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6708">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6709">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6709">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6710">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6710">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6711">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6711">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6712">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6712">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6713">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6713">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6714">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6714">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6715">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6716">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6716">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6717">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6718">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6718">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6719">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6719">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6720">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6720">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6721">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6722">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6722">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6723">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6724">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6724">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6725">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6725">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6726">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6726">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6763">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6763">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6764">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6764">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6765">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6765">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6766">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6766">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6767">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6767">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6768">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6768">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6769">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6769">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6770">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6770">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6771">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6772">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6772">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6773">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6774">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6775">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6775">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6776">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6776">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6800">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6800">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6801">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6801">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6802">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6803">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6803">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6805">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6805">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-6806">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6806">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6807">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6807">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6808">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6808">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6809">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6810">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6810">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6811">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6812">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6812">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6813">정규식이 해당 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6813">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6814">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6814">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6815">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6815">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6816">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6816">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6817">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6817">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6818">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6818">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6819">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6819">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6820">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6820">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6821">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6821">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6822">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6822">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6823">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6823">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6824">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6824">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6825">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6825">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6826">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6826">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6827">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6827">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6828">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6829">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6829">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6830">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6831">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6831">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6832">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6832">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6833">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6833">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6834">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6834">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6835">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6835">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6836">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6836">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6837">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6838">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6839">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6840">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6840">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6841">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6841">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6842">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6843">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6843">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6844">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6844">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6845">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6845">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6846">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6847">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6848">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6848">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6850">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6850">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-6851">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6851">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6852">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6852">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6853">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6853">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6854">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6854">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6855">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6855">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6856">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6856">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6857">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6857">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6858">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6858">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-6859">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6859">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6860">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6860">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6861">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6861">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6862">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6862">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6863">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6863">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6864">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6864">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6865">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6865">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6866">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6866">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6867">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6867">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6868">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6868">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6869">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6870">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6870">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6871">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6872">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6873">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6873">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6874">From 키워드를 `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6874">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6875">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6875">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6876">이 함수는 해당 `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6876">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6907">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6907">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6908">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6909">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6909">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6910">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6910">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6911">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6911">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6912">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6912">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6913">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6913">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6914">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6914">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6915">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6915">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6916">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6916">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6917">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6917">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6918">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6918">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6919">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6919">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6920">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6920">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6921">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6921">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6922">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6922">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6923">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6923">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6924">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6924">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6925">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6925">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6926">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6926">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6927">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6927">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6928">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6928">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6929">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6929">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6930">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6930">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6931">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6932">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6932">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6933">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6933">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6934">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6934">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6935">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6935">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-6936">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6936">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-6937">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6937">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-6938">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6938">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-6939">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6939">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6940">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6940">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6941">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6941">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6942">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6942">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6943">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6943">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6944">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6944">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6945">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6945">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6946">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6946">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6947">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6947">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6948">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6948">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6949">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6949">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="06242-6950">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6950">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6951">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6951">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="06242-6952">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6952">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6953">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6953">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6954">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6954">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6955">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6955">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6956">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6956">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6957">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6957">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6958">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6958">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-6959">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6959">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6960">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6960">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6961">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6961">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6962">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6963">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6963">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6964">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6965">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6965">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6966">정규식이 해당 `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6966">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6967">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6967">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6969">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6969">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6983">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6983">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-6984">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6984">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6985">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6986">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6986">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6987">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6987">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6988">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6988">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6989">2-4자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6989">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6990">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6990">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6991">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+"(선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6991">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6992">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6992">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6993">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6993">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6994">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6994">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6995">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6995">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-6996">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6996">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6997">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6997">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-6998">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6998">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-6999">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-6999">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7000">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7000">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7001">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7001">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-7002">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7002">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7003">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7004">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7004">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7005">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7006">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7006">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7007">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7008">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7008">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7009">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7011">Regex_sweden_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7011">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7012">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7012">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-7013">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7013">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="06242-7014">Keyword_sweden_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7014">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7045">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7045">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-7046">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7046">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7047">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7047">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7048">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7048">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7049">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7049">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7050">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7050">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="06242-7051">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7051">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7052">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7052">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-7053">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7053">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-7054">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7054">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7055">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7055">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7056">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7056">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7057">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7057">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7058">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7058">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7059">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7059">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7060">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7061">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7061">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-7062">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7062">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7063">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7063">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7079">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7079">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-7080">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7080">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7081">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7082">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7082">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7083">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7084">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7084">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7085">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7085">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7086">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7086">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7087">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7087">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-7088">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7088">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="06242-7089">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7089">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7090">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7090">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7091">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7091">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7092">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7092">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7093">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7093">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7094">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7094">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7095">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7095">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7096">From 키워드를 `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7096">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="06242-7097">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7097">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7098">이 함수는 해당 `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7098">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7124">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7124">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7125">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7126">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7126">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7127">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7128">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7128">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7129">4문자 은행 코드(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7129">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7130">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7130">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7131">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7131">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7132">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7132">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7133">1-3개 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7133">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7134">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7135">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7135">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7136">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7138">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7138">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7139">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7139">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7173">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7173">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7175">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7175">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7177">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7177">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7178">1개 문자(영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7178">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7179">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7179">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7180">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7180">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7181">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7182">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7185">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7185">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7186">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7186">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7187">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwanese_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7189">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7189">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7193">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7193">身份證號</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7196">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7196">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7197">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7197">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7198">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7198">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7199">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7200">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7200">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7201">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7201">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7202">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7202">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7203">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7203">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7204">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7204">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7205">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7205">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7206">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7206">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7207">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7207">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7208">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="06242-7209">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7209">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7210">숫자 "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7210">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7211">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7211">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7212">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7212">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7213">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7213">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7215">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7215">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7218">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7218">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7219">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7219">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7230">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7230">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7231">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7231">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7232">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7232">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7233">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7233">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7234">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7234">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7235">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7235">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7236">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7236">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7238">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7238">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="06242-7240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7241">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7241">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="06242-7242">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7242">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7243">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7243">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="06242-7244">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="06242-7244">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>
